org.jetlang.fibers
Interface Fiber

All Superinterfaces:
Disposable, DisposingExecutor, java.util.concurrent.Executor, Scheduler
All Known Implementing Classes:
FiberStub, ThreadFiber
public interface Fiber
extends DisposingExecutor, Scheduler

Fibers provide event queueing, scheduling, and full pub/sub capabilities when combined with a Channel. Fibers can be backed by a dedicated thread (ThreadFiber) or use a thread pool (PoolFiberFactory).

Events executed by Fiber will be process sequentially.

Author:
mrettig
